page.title: 19ARMED FORCES. RNAS CULDROSE
page.content: The Royal Naval Air Station at {CULDROSE}is sited,just off the A3083 main road.From 1985 Culdrose will be having some permanent squarons of new AEW Sea Kings.In 1985 there were about 2,500 personell and 10 of those are Fire crew inc 5 stand_by crew.The perimetre of Culdrose is roughly 2 and a half miles.In{GRID REF NO}01680024 they have a viewing enclosure and you have the hangers for the AEW(airborn early warning) Sea Kings,you also have the hangers for the Jetstream,an aircraft for navigation training.If you want to find out more about Culdrose look at {grid ref no} 01640024.
